member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.Cube
member.summary: The Cube class represents an OLAP cube that holds a multi dimensional representation of a flat data set. A cube is analogous to a table in a relational database. Where a table in a relational database has two dimensions, a cube can have any number of dimensions. In its simplest form, the dimensions of a cube correspond to a field of the flat data set.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Unknown
member.summary: Describes a dimension with an unknown or unspecified type.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Time
member.summary: Indicates that a dimension refers to time (for example, year, month, week, day).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Measure
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains measures.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Other
member.summary: Describes a dimension of the default dimension type, which is used for dimensions that are not time dimensions or measure dimensions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Quantitative
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains quantitative elements (for example, income level, or number of children).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Accounts
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains an accounts structure with parent-child relationships.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Customers
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains customer information. The lowest level represents individual customers.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Products
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains product information. The lowest level represents individual products.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Scenario
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains different business scenarios.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Utility
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains only calculated members. This type of dimension is usually used for data visualization techniques.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Currency
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains currency information.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Rates
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains different types of rates (for example, buy, sell, or discounted).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Channel
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains information about a distribution channel.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Promotion
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains information about marketing and advertising promotions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Organization
member.summary: Describes a dimension that represents the reporting structure of an organization.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.BillOfMaterials

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Geography

member.summary: Identifies user defined hierarchies.

member.summary: Identifies attributes with no attribute .

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType
member.summary: An enumeration of different function that can be applied to measures.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Unknown
member.summary: The aggregated function is undefined.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Sum
member.summary: The aggregated function adds all values.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Count
member.summary: The aggregated function will count the number of the values.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Min
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the smallest value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Max
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the largest value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Average
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the average of cells value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Variance
member.summary: The aggregated function will estimates variance based on the sample.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.Std
member.summary: The aggregated function will estimates the standart deviation based on sample.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.DistinctCount
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the number of distinct, nonempty tuples in a set.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.None
member.summary: No aggregation performed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.AverageOfChildren
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the average of the measure's children.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.FirstNonEmpty
member.summary: The aggregated function will returns the measure's first nonempty member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.AggregatorType.LastNonEmpty

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Data.Base.Cube
member.summary: The Cube class represents an OLAP cube that holds a multi dimensional representation of a flat data set. A cube is analogous to a table in a relational database. Where a table in a relational database has two dimensions, a cube can have any number of dimensions. In its simplest form, the dimensions of a cube correspond to a field of the flat data set.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Data.ICube
member.summary: The ICube interface represents an OLAP cube that holds a multi dimensional representation of a flat data set. A cube is analogous to a table in a relational database. Where a table in a relational database has two dimensions, a cube can have any number of dimensions. In its simplest form, the dimensions of a cube correspond to a field of the flat data set.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.DataSourceBase.ParentInFrontForColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parent for columns is in front of children.
member.value: true if parent is in front of children; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
If is true, the query set sorts members in a level in their natural order. Their natural order is the default ordering of the members along the hierarchy when no other sort conditions are specified. Child members immediately follow their parent members.
If is false, the query set sorts the members in a level using a post-natural order. In other words, child members precede their parents. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.DataSourceBase.ParentInFrontForRows
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parent for rows is in front of children.
member.value: true if parent is in front of children; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
If is true, the query set sorts members in a level in their natural order. Their natural order is the default ordering of the members along the hierarchy when no other sort conditions are specified. Child members immediately follow their parent members.
If is false, the query set sorts the members in a level using a post-natural order. In other words, child members precede their parents. The default value is true.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.DataSourceBase.ExpandToLevelAsync(Infragistics.Olap.IFilterViewModel,Infragistics.Olap.Data.ILevel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads and expands hierarchy up to the specified level.
member.param: The whose hierarchy will be expanded.
The level which specifies the depth of hierarchy will be expanded up to.
Boolean value indicating whether to execute an additional task which calls the RefreshGrid method.
member.returns: The which completes when all members of hierarchy are loaded and set to expanded up to the specified level depth.

remarks.p: To preserve legacy behavior, the value of the refreshGrid parameter resolves to false when no value has been specified.
When true is specified as the value of the refreshGrid, a reference to this additional task is returned. This additional task is executed as a continuation, on the same thread as the antecedent Task.

If ParentInFront is true, the query set sorts members in a level in their natural order. Their natural order is the default ordering of the members along the hierarchy when no other sort conditions are specified. Child members immediately follow their parent members.
If ParentInFront is false, the query set sorts the members in a level using a post-natural order. In other words, child members precede their parents.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.IOlapViewModel.ParentInFrontForColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parent for columns is in front of children.
member.value: true if parent is in front of children; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
If is true, the query set sorts members in a level in their natural order. Their natural order is the default ordering of the members along the hierarchy when no other sort conditions are specified. Child members immediately follow their parent members.
If is false, the query set sorts the members in a level using a post-natural order. In other words, child members precede their parents. The default value is true.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper
member.summary: A base class for all value conditions wrappers that are used to display a condition in the UI.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.Resolve(System.Nullable{Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterCondition},System.Nullable{Infragistics.Olap.TopValueFilterCondition},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Resolves a or into a wrapper.
member.remarks: Only one of the valueCondition and topValueCondition arguments should be specified and isTop should be specified only when topValueCondition is present.
member.param: The value condition for which to create a wrapper.
The top value condition for which to create a wrapper.
Specifies wheter the top value condtion is in TOP or BOTTOM form.
member.returns: A wrapper for the specified condition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.Order
member.summary: Gets an integer that should be used for ordering the condition wrappers.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name for the condition wrapper.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.Condition
member.summary: Gets the value condition for the condition wrapper. Returns null in case of top value condition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.TopCondition
member.summary: Gets the top value condition for the condition wrapper. Returns null in case of value condition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.ValueFilterConditionWrapper.IsTop
member.summary: Specifies wheter the top condition is in TOP or BOTTOM form. True for top, False for bottom, null if the wrapper is for a value condition.
